branchCategory.name: Air Nozzles
branchCategory.description: <p>Air&nbsp;nozzles are available in many variations and are available with tube materials including nylon, soft nylon, soft copper pipe and OST tubing. Sizes range from 4mm-20mm.</p>

branchItem.name: KN
branchItem.description: <p>With the release of the KN series nozzles and gauge heads 30~90% of air consumption required for the current nozzle operation can be saved with the appropriate selection of the new nozzle and sizing. Many variations of nozzle are available with tube materials including nylon, soft nylon, soft copper pipe and OST tubing. Sizes range from 4mm-20mm.</p>

branchItem.name: AXTS
branchItem.description: <p>AXTS040-X2 series pulse blowing valve air saving unit automatically turns the air flow on and off to improve the efficiency of blowing through a cycling action.&nbsp; Additionally, they can reduce air consumption versus a continuous blow scenario.&nbsp; The On/Off timing is user selectable.</p>
